item.title: Problems with models
item.dc:creator: @Rovaa Rovaa
item.description:
@Rovaa wrote:

Okay so I have recently tried numerous things to fix my dkite custom model, I had to convert it from class.8 to itemdef here is my code

case 7887:
itemDef.modelid = 13701;
itemDef.name = “Dragon kiteshield”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1560;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 344;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 1104;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -14;
itemDef.anInt165 = 13700;
itemDef.anInt200 = 13700;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;

I added extracted models to my raw file, the models were 13700/13701. I don’t know if those aren’t the right models
or if I did anything wrong, but if someone could please help me find a solution i’d be very thankful.

Problem pictures
